patthana18.28:1.1_0: Saraṇaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana18.28:1.1_1: Araṇaṁ sārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo nasārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana18.28:2.1_0: Hetuyā dve …pe… aññamaññe ekaṁ …pe… vipāke ekaṁ …pe… avigate dve. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
